plot: Four women have quite an unusual hobby: they watch every funeral in their small hometown. Maybe the deceased did not die by a natural causes - and most times he didn't.
plot_en: Four women have quite an unusual hobby: they watch every funeral in their small hometown. Maybe the deceased did not die by a natural causes - and most times he didn't.
plot_es: Four women have quite an unusual hobby: they watch every funeral in their small hometown. Maybe the deceased did not die by a natural causes - and most times he didn't.
title: Vier Frauen und ein Todesfall
